title: NoC Answers successfully validated for a CAA
specs: Richard - with the ability to create a case for a particular jurisdiction within an organisation
Matt - with a pui-CAA within a different organisation from Richard

the configuration for the case type of Case C1 is such that there is a NoCRequest event available to users with the IDAM ID Caseworker-CAA when the case is in the state established following case creation
is made by Matt to validate the answers provided to the NoC questions in order to become the representative for Mario on C1
